Author: GitHub
Description:
The GitHub Copilot SDK is now in technical preview. You can now add an AI agent to any application with just a few lines of code. Whether you use your existing GitHub Copilot subscription or bring your own model key, the SDK handles the complex steps for you. Describe the outcome, define the capabilities, and ship your agent today.

Learn more about GitHub Copilot SDK: https://github.com/github/copilot-sdk?utm\_source=youtube-sizzle-marketing-video-copilot-sdk&utm\_medium=social&utm\_campaign=cli-sdk-jan-2026

#GitHubCopilot #CopilotSDK #AI

Title: Add an AI agent to your app with GitHub Copilot SDK
